input.sentences: as we waited for the thanksgiving turkey to finish cooking
we then removed it from the oven to cut it up .
the dogs watched in alert to the smell of the food
everyone waited for the food to arrive to the table
later everyone sat down to digest the food .
output.sentences: Thanksgiving was finally here and we waited for the turkey.
We finally removed it from the oven and cut it.
Our dogs sat to watch and smell the food.
Everyone else just waited for the food at the table.
After we ate we sat down to digest our food.
